BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor

Items.Title: A Local Law to conduct a study and publish a report on the impacts of algorithmic tools and automated employment decision tools on employees
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Creation of a task force to review the impacts of artificial intelligence on civil service and civil service employees.
